Description:
Join us on The Developer‚Äôs Journey, where we dive deep into the candid stories of software engineers navigating the highs and lows of their careers. From overcoming challenges to celebrating wins, this series offers an honest glimpse into the realities of life in tech.

April Dunnam helps developers and businesses build apps and automate processes with low-code solutions using Power Platform. April shares her personal journey, starting out as the owner of a small consulting company doing some blogging on the side to becoming a Microsoft MVP and sought after speaker to where she is today as a Microsoft Power Platform Advocate and YouTube influencer. She did it all while overcoming the insecurities that plague us all!

Whether you‚Äôre a seasoned developer or just starting out, this story will inspire and resonate with you.
